entry.tran: 新闻摄影（工作）；摄影图片报道
entry.def: Photojournalism is a form of journalism in which stories are presented mainly through photographs rather than words.

example.ex: ...some of the finest photo-journalism of the Civil Rights era.
example.tran: 一些民权运动时期最为优秀的摄影新闻

means.word_mean: 1. journalism that presents a story primarily through the use of pictures
